```{r}
library("emmeans")     # for linear contrasts
library("tidybayes")   # tidying up results from Bayesian models
library("brms")        # Bayesian regression models with Stan
library("tidyverse")   # for wrangling, plotting, etc. 
library("dplyr")
```

```{r}
df.exp_1 = read_csv("../../data/prolific/data_long.csv") 


df.exp_1 = df.exp_1[df.exp_1$scenario_id == '0',]
head(df.exp_1)

```
```{r}
# main regression
fit.brm_exp_1= brm(formula = permissibility_rating ~ 1 + causal_structure + evitability + action + (1 | worker_id),
                      data = df.exp_1,
                      seed = 1)
```

```{r}
fit.brm_exp_1 %>% 
  summary()
```
```{r}
# contrasts
emm = fit.brm_exp_1 %>% 
  emmeans(specs = pairwise ~ causal_structure,
          type = "response")
emm
```
